label: Manchurian
description: Deep-fried ingredients in a flavorful soy sauce-based sauce, a popular Indo-Chinese dish.

label: Chilli Paneer
description: Crispy paneer cubes in a vibrant sauce with sweet, spicy, and tangy flavors.

label: Chowmein
description: Springy noodles stir-fried with crisp veggies and savory protein, a satisfying Chinese-American classic.

label: Jaipuri Tikki
description: Crispy potato patties bursting with spices, a must-try street food from Jaipur.

label: Aaloo Tikki
description: Mashed potatoes mixed with spices, shaped into patties, and shallow-fried until golden brown and crispy.

label: Cheese Corn Tikki
description: Mashed potatoes, sweet corn, and cheese, pan-fried until crispy outside and gooey inside.

label: Schezwan Paneer
description: Crispy paneer cubes in a spicy, tangy Schezwan sauce, a vegetarian delight.

label: Peanut Sadeko
description: A spicy, tangy Nepali salad with roasted peanuts and chopped vegetables.

label: Bhatmaas Sadeko
description: Roasted soybeans with spices and fresh ingredients, a tangy, spicy Nepali snack.

label: Mustang Aloo
description: Crispy potato wedges in a fiery blend of spices, a popular snack from Nepal.

label: Aloo Jeera
description: Potatoes cooked with cumin seeds and spices, a simple yet delicious Indian side dish.

label: French Fries
description: Deep-fried potato strips, crispy outside, fluffy inside, served with dipping sauces.

label: Peri Peri Fries
description: French fries coated in spicy, tangy Peri Peri seasoning, an addictive snack.

label: Shanghai Paneer
description: Crispy paneer in a spicy, tangy sauce with vegetables, a bold and satisfying appetizer.

label: Chicken Manchurian
description: Crispy fried chicken in a sweet and spicy sauce, versatile and delicious.

label: Chicken Chilly (Boneless)
description: Bite-sized boneless chicken in a spicy, flavorful sauce, perfect with noodles or fried rice.

label: Chicken Sadeko
description: Grilled chicken marinated in spices and citrus juices, mixed with onions and tomatoes, a refreshing Nepali dish.
